sentences.english: A weight in percentage represents the degree of similarity.
sentences.chinese: 百分比形式的权重代表的是相似度。

sentences.english: Bismarck was enormously powerful in his 26 years as Prussia's political leader.
sentences.chinese: 在担任普鲁士政治领袖的26年间，俾斯麦位高权重。

sentences.english: The blending weights can be painted per-vertex and are normalized automatically.
sentences.chinese: 权重的混合，可画每个顶点，并自动归。

sentences.english: Also disturbute a weighting factor among 5 projects.
sentences.chinese: 而每一个项目都要算出其权重值。

sentences.english: Selection of weighting and use of a complex regression equation should be justified.
sentences.chinese: 权重选择和使用复杂的回归方程应合理。

sentences.english: You need other ways to estimate the weight of such use cases.
sentences.chinese: 您需要其他的方式来估算这种用例的权重。

sentences.english: Weight of index is made by AHP and Delphi.
sentences.chinese: 指标权重的确定采用了特尔斐法和层次分析法。

sentences.english: Then use the following subroutine to load the field weights into memory.
sentences.chinese: 然后使用以下子例程将字段权重装入内存。

sentences.english: The address is its location in the weight array.
sentences.chinese: 地址是它在权重数组中的位置。

sentences.english: You can then update relative weights to each policy by simply moving the sliders.
sentences.chinese: 要更新每个策略的相对权重，只需移动滑块。

sentences.english: And then, we put forward the dispatch-based weight algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 在设计过程中提出了基于调度经验的权重算法。

sentences.english: Oscillation heavyweights also fell, dragged down part of the index.
sentences.chinese: 权重股也振荡回落，部分拖累了指数。

sentences.english: An index in which greater weight is given to shares that have a larger market capitalization.
sentences.chinese: 指市场总值较高的股票占较大权重的指数。

sentences.english: The spectral characteristics of pure reagent are displayed by the plot of weight of the principal component vs wave-length.
sentences.chinese: 在主成分权重图上体现了纯试剂的光谱特征。

sentences.english: Statistical analysis for continuous data was done by weighted mean difference or standardised mean difference.
sentences.chinese: 连续数据以权重平均差或标准化平均差作统计分析。

sentences.english: The weight of sentence is calculated based on a multi-feature method.
sentences.chinese: 基于这些特征使用了多特征的句子权重计算方法。

definition: stock market index/share price index/abbr. for 股票指數|股票指数[gu3 piao4 zhi3 shu4]
Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), abbr. for 上海證券交易所|上海证券交易所[Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]
(Tw) to pull sth up/(fig.) to give a boost to/to support
slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
(of sales, prices etc) to fall/to drop/decline/slump
(of a stock price or market index) currently higher than at the previous day's close
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
